snippet: The Quebec provincial police said that they had arrested three people about 30 miles north of the Saint-Jérôme jail, from which the inmates escaped.
lead_paragraph: The Quebec provincial police said that they had arrested three people about 30 miles north of the Saint-Jérôme jail, from which the inmates escaped.

headline.main: 2 Quebec Inmates Climb Rope to Helicopter to Escape Jail
headline.print_headline: 2 Quebec Inmates Climb Rope to Helicopter to Escape Jail
